title: Simulation
description: Simulation configuration schema. Specify an experiment using multiple engines and transceiver functions.

SimulationLoop.description: Type of simulation loop used in the experiment

SimulationTimeout.description: Experiment Timeout (in seconds). It refers to simulation time.

SimulationTimestep.description: Time in seconds the simulation advances in each Simulation Loop. It refers to simulation time.

DataPackProcessor.description: Framework used to process and rely datapack data between engines. Available options are the TF framework (tf) and Computation Graph (cg)

ProcessLauncherType.description: ProcessLauncher type to be used for launching engine processes

EngineConfigs.description: Engines that will be started in the experiment

ExternalProcesses.description: Additional processes that will be started in the experiment

DataPackProcessingFunctions.description: Transceiver and Preprocessing functions that will be used in the experiment

StatusFunction.description: Status Function that will be used in the experiment

ComputationalGraph.description: List of filenames defining the ComputationalGraph that will be used in the experiment

EventLoopTimeout.description: Event loop timeout (in seconds). 0 means no timeout. If not specified 'SimulationTimeout' is used instead

EventLoopTimestep.description: Time length (in seconds) of each loop, i.e it is the inverse of the Event Loop frequency. If not specified 'SimulationTimestep' is used instead

ConnectROS.description: If this parameter is present a ROS node is started by NRPCoreSim

ConnectMQTT.description: If this parameter is present an MQTT client is instantiated and connected
